title: New: M.I.A. – Come Walk With Me
content:
So the new tune from camp M.

I.A dropped earlier today and sent the Internet into a tizz. Less of a tizz than I expected, but regardless, more than I few people got excited. Now I hate to piss on a perfectly harmless parade, but the new track, Come walk with me, hardly fills me with confidence in the upcoming album, Matangi. It all just sounds a bit awkward; the singing, the supposedly inspiring lyrics not to mention the pop sensibility that suddenly becomes disinterested and embarks on a little experimental adventure mid track.

M.I.A; if you’re reading this, which of course you’re not, this is what I want. Weird ass instruments, provocative streams of consciousness, socially conscious yet seemingly erratic flows and if you’re feeling particularly generous, with a sprinkle of rebellious thinking.

Thnx xxxo
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
